channel.title: 4chan is ripping YouTube right now.
channel.description:
Have you guys noticed? YouTube's been hacked. Whoopie doo dah.
[url]https://boards.ign.com/teh_vestibule/b5296/193541450/[/url]
Apparently someone called 'ScriptHacker' can modify YouTube's scripts through simply commenting on a video.
Some have viruses that remove System 32 files, So I won't post any links to videos incase some of you get important files deleted.
EDIT
You can't see the hacks now as YouTube has been put on 'Safety Mode'.
You'd get popups saying things like Justin Beiber has died, and a link to a fake CNN News website that would give you a virus.
Most of them were pranks without viruses as well.

item.title: 4chan is ripping YouTube right now.
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
RM24:

Yes. Thank you. Someone who actually makes sense. When someone says “4chan” everybody else thinks of nothing but /b/.

There are now fifty boards on 4chan, when moot just recently added the 4chan board /vp/, which is based on the discussion of Pokémon.

(Only a couple of them are still good now, anyways. /vp/ is not one of them.)

Holy shit I clicked on it and it displayed an absolutely disgusting picture saying board has been removed.:fffuuu::fffuuu::fffuuu::’(:’(:’(

WTF??? It happens to all the 4chan boards!!! I think youtube hacked 4chan back.

Read full topic

item.title: 4chan is ripping YouTube right now.
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
YARO:

But if they spread then they won’t have enough manpower to do anything majorly stupid and eventually die off. The amount of stupidity they generate is proportional to their quantity in one place…

You’re right, they wouldn’t be able to pull any of their huge stunts, but they would still generate just as much stupidity, only in tons of small bit here and there rather than in gigantic stunts.

item.title: 4chan is ripping YouTube right now.
item.dc:creator: SoaringScout
item.description:
I went to 4chan a few months ago. I quickly closed the page in fear of a virus attack… considering how I wouldn’t be surprised if they had already destroyed their internet homeland.

Most of what I remember is a POORLY put together website with a shitload of porn and adds all over it.\

EDIT: I think I went to the wrong URL. I must have went to a .com URL instead of the original .org URL.
